prometheus-operator : https://blog.container-solutions.com/prometheus-operator-beginners-guide

istio: https://istio.io/latest/docs/setup/getting-started/

cd prometheus-opr
kubectl create -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prometheus-operator/prometheus-operator/master/bundle.yaml 
kubectl apply -f rbac.yaml
kubectl apply -f prometheus.yaml
kubectl apply -f service-monitor.yaml
kubectl apply -f kube-grafana
kubectl get pods

kubectl port-forward svc/prometheus-operated 9090:9090
kubectl apply -f sm-api.yaml
kubectl apply -f example.yaml
kubectl apply -f kube-grafana
kubectl apply -f service-monitor-cert.yaml
kubectl get pods
kubectl port-forward svc/grafana 3000


install keda: https://keda.sh/docs/2.7/deploy/

kubectl apply -f https://github.com/kedacore/keda/releases/download/v2.7.1/keda-2.7.1.yaml
kubectl apply -f keda-so.yaml

istall ca:
kubectl apply -f https://github.com/cert-manager/cert-manager/releases/download/v1.8.2/cert-manager.yaml

install istio:

export PATH=$PWD/bin:$PATH
istioctl install --set profile=demo -y
kubectl create namespace apps
kubectl label namespace apps istio-injection=enabled
kubectl apply -f samples/bookinfo/platform/kube/bookinfo.yaml -n apps
kubectl apply -f samples/bookinfo/networking/bookinfo-gateway.yaml


helm template \
  cert-manager jetstack/cert-manager \
  --namespace cert-manager \
  --create-namespace \
  --version v1.8.0 \
  > cert-manager.1.4.yaml
